about_the_game:
For glory, for honor, for Warhalla!

Surpass your rivals with ridiculous Viking weapons and become Thor's chosen one!
Once you’ve proven to be the fiercest Viking of the tournament you will become the ultimate boss for the other players wielding the hammer of Thor himself! It’s either you or the other 9 players!



Every year the leaders of the ten most prestigious Viking clans fight in a tournament to honor Thor and decide who is worthy to join his army in Warhalla. You take the role of one of these clan-leaders fighting in this epic tournament for glory, honor, and met! Only the most savage weapons are given by Thor to determine once and for all who is worthy to enter Warhalla's holy halls!



Warhalla is a third-person shooter with a unique game mode that combines fast paced classical deathmatch with an epic Thor's Champion finale! In each round 10 players fight to prove their strength before Thor. Only the most impressive player will receive Thor’s Hammer and turn into Thor’s Champion.
Thor’s Champion now stands against all 9 other players in a 1 versus 9 boss fight. If he manages to survive a certain time against or take down all other players he wins. Only then will he be allowed to enter Warhalla!



Unique combination of deathmatch multiplayer shooter and bossfight
Six crazy weapons
Customizable characters
Viking-metal soundtrack
Custom Community Servers

Future Plans include:
-Dedicated Servers
-Leaderboards & Ranking System
-Additional Character Customization
-Additional GameModes (Casual & Competitive)
-Additional Maps
*These are intentions and subject to change

name: Warhalla

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit / Windows 8 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit / Windows 8 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5/i7 3.3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Each Match 10 players fight to prove their strength before Thor. Only the most impressive viking will receive Thor’s Hammer and turn into Thor’s Champion for a chance to prove to be worthy to feast among the gods in Warhalla!
